title: VIPONES Bell Bottom Jeans for Women Stretchy High Waisted Flare Curvy Denim Pants
description: 【Running Small】Most clients said that it is a little small on the waist and short on the length, if you are between two sizes or plump , please select one size up.

【Highlight your figure】Bell bottoms with a big horn that covers the whole shoe. The high waist design enhances your waist line. Stretchy denim fabric shows your body curvy and give you the freedom to move.

【Unique Design】With classic five-pocket design, bootcut jeans for women offer both functionality and trendy style. You'll have plenty of space to store your essentials while rocking a fashionable and slim look.

【Various occasions】Versatile flared high rise baggy jeans add a touch of vintage flair to your outfit and are perfect for leisure, vacations, school, street and etc, making them a must-have in your wardrobe.

【Strtchy Fabric】Adopt high quality denim fabric, which has the characteristics of softness, breathability, elasticity and good hanging sense, so that you will feel free in all positions when sitting or squatting.
